template.name: menuitem
template.value: <menuitem id="menu_2" name="销售" sequence="12"/> <menuitem id="menu_2_0" name="CRM" sequence="1" parent="menu_2"/> <menuitem id="menu_2_1" name="销售" sequence="2" parent="menu_2"/> <menuitem id="menu_2_99" name="常用报表" sequence="99" parent="menu_2"/> <menuitem id="menu_2_100" name="设置" sequence="100" parent="menu_2"/>

template.name: ir sequence
template.value: <record id="seq_$fileNameWithoutExtension$" model="ir.sequence"> <field name="name">$clipboard$</field> <field name="code">$clipboard$</field> <field name="prefix">OUT%(year)s%(month)s%(day)s</field> <field name="padding">5</field> <field name="company_id" eval="False"/> </record>

template.name: options
template.description: 下拉菜单属性 不显示创建与编辑，不显示对象链接

template.name: button object
template.value: <button name='button_loading' states='草稿' string='提交草稿' type='object' class='oe_highlight'/>

template.name: search
template.value: <record id="view_search_sale_order" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">sale.order.search</field> <field name="model">sale.order</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="查询"> <field name="name" string="单据" filter_domain="['|','|',('name','ilike',self),('partner_id','ilike',self),('client_order_ref','ilike',self)]"/> <field name="partner_id" operator="child_of"/> <field name="user_id"/> <filter string="今天" name="today" domain="[('date_order', '>=', time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')),('date_order', '<=', time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59'))]" /> <filter string="本月" name="month" domain="[('date_order','<=', time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),('date_order','>=',time.strftime('%Y-%m-01'))]" /> <filter string="本年" name="year" domain="[('date_order','<=', time.strftime('%%Y-12-31')),('date_order','>=',time.strftime('%%Y-01-01'))]" /> <filter string="我的单据" domain="[('user_id','=',uid)]" name="my_orders_filter"/> <filter string="需要我审核的单据" domain="[('write_id','=',uid)]" name="my_write_id_filter"/> <filter string="未读消息" name="message_needaction" domain="[('message_needaction','=',True)]"/> <separator/> <filter string="未审核" name='state1' domain="[('state','=','草稿')]"/> <filter string="处理中" name='state2' domain="[('state','=','处理中')]"/> <filter string="已审核" name='state3' domain="[('state','=','已审核')]"/> <separator/> <filter string="是否样品" name='is_sample' domain="[('is_sample','=',True)]"/> <separator/> <group expand="0" string="分组"> <filter string="是否样品" name='is_sample' domain="[]" context="{'group_by':'is_sample'}"/> <filter string="审核人" name='write_id' domain="[]" context="{'group_by':'write_id'}"/> <filter string="业务员" name ='user_id' domain="[]" context="{'group_by':'user_id'}"/> <filter string="客户" name='partner_id' domain="[]" context="{'group_by':'partner_id'}"/> <filter string="月单据" name='date_order' domain="[]" context="{'group_by':'date_order'}"/> <filter string="单据状态" name='state' domain="[]" context="{'group_by':'state'}"/> <filter string="公司" name='company_id' domain="[]" context="{'group_by':'company_id'}"/> </group> </search> </field> </record>

template.value: <record id="odoo_calendar_sale_order" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">sale.order.calendar</field> <field name="model">sale.order</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <calendar string="销售日历" color="state" date_start="date_order"> <field name="partner_id"/> <field name="amount" widget="monetary"/> </calendar> </field> </record>

template.name: view inherit
template.value:
<record model="ir.ui.view" id="odoo_sale_order_form_inherit"> <field name="name">sale.order.form.inherit</field> <field name="model">sale.order</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="Amos_Sale.odoo_sale_order_form"/> <field name="arch" type="xml">
<xpath expr="//page[@name='page_card']" position="after"> <page string="发货单"> <field name="stock_ids"> <tree string="出库单"> <field name="name"/> <field name="date_order"/> <field name="delivery_date"/> <field name="user_id" string="业务员"/> <field name="state"/> <button name="unlink" type="object" string="删除" groups="Amos_Sale.sale_user"/> </tree> </field> </page> </xpath>
<xpath expr="//label[@name='placeholder']" position="after"> <button string="创建出库单" type="action" name="%(Amos_Stock_Sale.menu_stock_picking_out_only_one)d" groups="Amos_Sale.sale_user" attrs="{'invisible': ['|',('delivery_state','=','全部出库'),('state','!=','已审核')]}"/>
</xpath> <xpath expr="//field[@name='delivery_date']" position="after"> <field name="delivery_state"/> </xpath> <xpath expr='//field[@name="order_line"]/form/sheet/group/group[@name="g2"]/field[@name="name"]' position="after"> <field name="quantity_out" readonly='1'/> </xpath> <xpath expr="/form/sheet/notebook/page/field[@name='order_line']/tree/field[@name='product_uom_qty']" position="after"> <field name="quantity_out" readonly='1'/> </xpath> </field> </record>

template.value: <record id="view_order_form_editable_list" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">sale.order.form.editable.list</field> <field name="model">sale.order</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="sale.view_order_form"/> <field name="groups_id" eval="[(4, ref('product.group_stock_packaging')), (4, ref('sale.group_mrp_properties'))]"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <xpath expr="//field[@name='order_line']/tree" position="attributes"> <attribute name="editable"/> </xpath> </field> </record>

template.name: default many2many
template.value:
production_ids = fields.Many2many('mrp.production.line', 'mrp_production_line_workorder_rel', 'workorder_id', 'production_id', default=_get_default_production_ids, string=u'物料明细')
def _get_default_production_ids(self): context = dict(self._context or {}) active_id = context.get('active_id') active_model = context.get('active_model') workorder = self.env[active_model].browse(active_id[0]) production_ids = self.env['mrp.production.line'].search( [('order_id', '=', workorder.production_id.id), ('workorder_id', '=', False)]) return [(6, 0, [production_ids.ids])]

template.value: <filter string="今天订单" name="today" domain="[('date_order', '>=', time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')),('date_order', '<=', time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59'))]" /> <filter string="昨天订单" name="yesterday" domain="[('date_order','>=', (context_today() -datetime.timedelta(days=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')),('date_order','<=', (context_today() -datetime.timedelta(days=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')) ]"/> <filter string="本周订单" name="week" domain="['&',('date_order', '>=', (context_today() + relativedelta(weeks=-1,days=1,weekday=0)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')),('date_order', '<=', (context_today() + relativedelta(weekday=6)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')),]"/> <filter string="上周订单" name="last_week" domain="[('date_order','>=', (context_today() - datetime.timedelta(weeks=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')),('date_order','<=', (context_today() - datetime.timedelta(weeks=1,days=-6)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59'))]"/> <filter string="本月订单" name="month1" domain="['&',('date_order', '>=', (context_today() + relativedelta(day=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')),('date_order', '<=', (context_today() + relativedelta(months=1, day=1, days=-1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')),]"/> <filter string="上月订单" name="last_month" domain="[('date_order','<', time.strftime('%Y-%m-01 00:00:00')),('date_order','>=', (context_today() - relativedelta(months=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-01 00:00:00') ) ]"/> <filter string="本年订单" name="year" domain="[('date_order','<=', time.strftime('%Y-12-31 23:59:59')),('date_order','>=',time.strftime('%Y-01-01 00:00:00'))]"/>
template.description: 日期查询数据 长日期

template.value: <filter string="今天订单" name="today" domain="[('date_order', '>=', time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),('date_order', '<=', time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))]" /> <filter string="昨天订单" name="yesterday" domain="[('date_order','>=', (context_today() -datetime.timedelta(days=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),('date_order','<=', (context_today() -datetime.timedelta(days=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')) ]"/> <filter string="本周订单" name="week" domain="['&',('date_order', '>=', (context_today() + relativedelta(weeks=-1,days=1,weekday=0)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),('date_order', '<=', (context_today() + relativedelta(weekday=6)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),]"/> <filter string="上周订单" name="last_week" domain="[('date_order','>=', (context_today() - datetime.timedelta(weeks=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),('date_order','<=', (context_today() - datetime.timedelta(weeks=1,days=-6)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))]"/> <filter string="本月订单" name="month1" domain="['&',('date_order', '>=', (context_today() + relativedelta(day=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),('date_order', '<=', (context_today() + relativedelta(months=1, day=1, days=-1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),]"/> <filter string="上月订单" name="last_month" domain="[('date_order','<', time.strftime('%Y-%m-01')),('date_order','>=', (context_today() - relativedelta(months=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-01') ) ]"/> <filter string="本年订单" name="year" domain="[('date_order','<=', time.strftime('%Y-12-31')),('date_order','>=',time.strftime('%Y-01-01'))]"/>

template.value: <separator string="教材杂费" colspan="2"/> <field name="order_line"> <tree string="教材杂费" editable="bottom"> <field name="sequence" widget="handle"/> <field name="product_id" required='1' options="{'no_open': True, 'no_create': True, 'no_create_edit': True}"/> <field name="product_uom_qty"/> <field name="product_uom"/> <field name="price_unit"/> <field name="price_subtotal" sum="合计"/> <field name="name"/> </tree> </field>

template.name: button name div
template.value: <button name="create_hd_issue_order" type="object" class="oe_stat_button" icon="fa-pencil-square-o" string="创建工单" attrs="{'invisible': ['|',('state','in',('已完成')),('simple_id','!=',False)]}" groups="hd_problem.group_hd_issue_order" > </button>

template.name: field many2one invisible
template.value: <field name="$clipboard$" readonly='1' options="{'no_create': True, 'no_create_edit': True}" attrs="{'readonly': [('$clipboard$','!=',False)],'invisible': ['|',('$clipboard$', '=', False),('id', '=', False)]}"/>

template.name: views template
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <odoo> <record id="view_ly_template_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">ly.template.form</field> <field name="model">ly.template</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="预算模板"> <sheet> <group> <group> <field name="name"/> <field name="code"/> </group> <group> <field name="description"/> </group> </group> </sheet> </form> </field> </record>
<record id="view_ly_template_tree" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">ly.template.tree</field> <field name="model">ly.template</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="预算模板"> <field name="name"/> <field name="code"/> <field name="description"/> </tree> </field> </record>
<record id="action_ly_template" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">预算模板</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">ly.template</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="view_ly_template_tree"/> </record>
<menuitem action="action_ly_template" id="menu_action_ly_template" parent="ly_base.menu_budget_config" sequence="02"/>
</odoo>

template.name: footer
template.value: <footer> <button name="button_ok" string="确认" type="object" class="oe_highlight"/> or <button string="取消" class="oe_link" special="cancel"/> </footer>

template.name: widget web_ribbon
template.value: <widget name="web_ribbon" text="已放弃" bg_color="bg-danger" attrs="{'invisible': [('is_retain', '=', False)]}"/> <widget name="web_ribbon" text="已保留" attrs="{'invisible': [('is_retain', '=', True)]}"/>

template.name: search 1
template.value: <record id="view_search_$fileNameWithoutExtension$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$clipboard$.search</field> <field name="model">$clipboard$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="查询"> <field name="name" string="" filter_domain="['|',('name','ilike',self),('code','ilike',self)]"/> <filter string="我的单据" domain="[('user_id','=',uid)]" name="my_order_filter"/> <separator/> <filter string="今天单据" name="today" domain="[('date', '>=', time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),('date', '<=', time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))]"/> <filter string="昨天单据" name="yesterday" domain="[('date','>=', (context_today() -datetime.timedelta(days=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),('date','<=', (context_today() -datetime.timedelta(days=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')) ]"/> <filter string="本周单据" name="week" domain="['&',('date', '>=', (context_today() + relativedelta(weeks=-1,days=1,weekday=0)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),('date', '<=', (context_today() + relativedelta(weekday=6)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),]"/> <filter string="上周单据" name="last_week" domain="[('date','>=', (context_today() - datetime.timedelta(weeks=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),('date','<=', (context_today() - datetime.timedelta(weeks=1,days=-6)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))]"/> <filter string="本月单据" name="month1" domain="['&',('date', '>=', (context_today() + relativedelta(day=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),('date', '<=', (context_today() + relativedelta(months=1, day=1, days=-1)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')),]"/> <filter string="上月单据" name="last_month" domain="[('date','<', time.strftime('%Y-%m-01')),('date','>=', (context_today() - relativedelta(months=1)).strftime('%Y-%m-01') ) ]"/> <filter string="本年单据" name="year" domain="[('date','<=', time.strftime('%Y-12-31')),('date','>=',time.strftime('%Y-01-01'))]"/> <separator/> <filter string="未读消息" name="message_needaction" domain="[('message_needaction','=',True)]"/> <filter string="我的活动" name="activities_my" domain="[('activity_ids.user_id', '=', uid)]"/> <filter string="逾期工作" name="activities_overdue" domain="[('activity_ids.date_deadline', '<', context_today().strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))]"/> <filter string="今天的工作" name="activities_today" domain="[('activity_ids.date_deadline', '=', context_today().strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))]"/> <filter string="未来工作" name="activities_upcoming_all" domain="[('activity_ids.date_deadline', '>', context_today().strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))]"/> <separator/> <filter string="已归档" name="active_yes" domain="[('active','=',False)]"/> <filter string="未归档" name="active_no" domain="[('active','=',True)]"/> <separator/> <filter string="待处理" name="my_pending" domain="[('state','!=','已完成')]"/> <separator/> <group expand="0" string="分组"> <filter string="创建人" name="user_id" domain="[]" context="{'group_by':'user_id'}"/> <filter string="状态" name="state" domain="[]" context="{'group_by':'state'}"/> </group> </search> </field> </record>
